section_title: MITIGATION (various approaches, including opportunities for using markets, to enhance the cost-effectiveness of, and to promote, mitigation actions) (AWG-LCA)
sentences: In a drafting group held in the morning on sub-paragraph 1(b)(v) of the Bali Action Plan, many parties expressed satisfaction with the AWG-LCA Chair s revised text.
Some parties highlighted, however, that the text does not fully reflect their options, and expressed preference for the Tianjin text.
Some parties called for a clear process for moving forward.
